description: Tragedy struck Sydney's Bondi Beach as two suspected shooters opened fire, claiming nine lives and injuring eleven. Panic erupted as beachgoers fled the popular tourist spot. One assailant was killed, the other critically wounded. The attack occurred near a Hanukkah celebration, prompting condemnation from Israeli President Isaac Herzog as a "cruel attack on Jews."

title: 'Bang bang bang': Eyewitnesses recount panic during Bondi Beach shooting in Sydney
description: Tragedy struck Bondi Beach as a violent shooting left eleven dead and several injured. Eyewitnesses described a terrifying scene of continuous gunfire, with reports of two gunmen. Panic ensued as people fled the popular tourist spot, with victims seen on the ground. Authorities confirmed one shooter was killed and another critically wounded.

Sydney: Bondi Beach mass shooting declared 'terror incident' - top developments
description: A violent mass shooting by two gunmen at Sydney's famous Bondi Beach during a Chanukah celebration left nine people dead and several injured. One attacker was killed by police, while another was tackled by a bystander before being arrested. The attack has drawn widespread condemnation from national and international leaders.

AI models: Oracle founder lists 2 types, says Musk’s Tesla uses ‘low-latency’
description: Oracle founder Larry Ellison distinguished between two AI model types: those requiring real-time, low-latency decisions for applications like self-driving cars and robotics, and those where delays are acceptable, such as chatbots. He highlighted Tesla's use of local compute for immediate responses, emphasizing that both categories are crucial for AI's future.

title: ‘140+ all day’: Faster and fitter Shivam Mavi ready for IPL return | Exclusive
description: After three injury-hit years away from the IPL, Shivam Mavi feels reborn. Having fixed action-related side-flexion issues, the 27-year-old has played consistently for Uttar Pradesh across formats, clocking 140+ consistently.

description: The Congress intensified its campaign against alleged vote manipulation and electoral roll revisions with a massive rally in Delhi. Leaders like Mallikarjun Kharge and Rahul Gandhi addressed the gathering, accusing the government of stealing mandates and questioning the Election Commission's impartiality. The party claims to have collected over five crore signatures nationwide to highlight these concerns.

description: Joey Porter Sr. revealed the profound impact of his time with the struggling Miami Dolphins, which contrasted sharply with his winning culture in Pittsburgh.  The constant losses deeply affected his family, turning game days into dreaded events and forcing him to re-evaluate his role as both a player and father.

title: Why does the skin of your foot get so hard and thick?
'I arrived late because of my visa': Indian student on challenges of studying in Aus
description: Anvitha Reddy's journey to Monash University in Australia involved extensive applications and a challenging start due to a visa delay. She adapted to a flexible academic system, balancing studies with a part-time digital marketing role and managing living costs through student accommodation. Building a social circle took time, but she found connections through her accommodation and university activities.

title: ‘Brought untold shame’: Bengal gov fumes over Messi event chaos; urges for strict action
description: West Bengal governor CV Ananda Bose has called the chaos at Lionel Messi's event a "shame" for Kolkata and football lovers. He demanded strict accountability, including a judicial inquiry and arrests of organizers, emphasizing the need for a standard operating procedure for managing large congregations to prevent public suffering during commercialized events.

title: AQI ‘severe plus’ in Delhi: CAQM suspends all outdoor sports; warns of serious health risks to kids
description: Delhi-NCR's air quality has plunged to 'severe plus', prompting the Commission for Air Quality Management (CAQM) to halt all outdoor sports activities. This directive, aimed at protecting children's health, comes as the strictest Stage IV of the Graded Response Action Plan (GRAP) is enforced. Construction bans and truck entry restrictions are also in effect, with schools adopting hybrid learning.

title: Minor boys stab man to death in East Delhi over relationship with girl, apprehended
Mass shooting at Bondi Beach: Australian PM Albanese calls situation ‘distressing’
description: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese expressed shock following a mass shooting at Sydney's Bondi Beach, where multiple fatalities were reported. Emergency services are on the scene, with eight individuals transported to hospitals. The Prime Minister is coordinating with state officials and urging those nearby to follow police instructions.

title: Sydney shooting: Bystander tackles gunman at Bondi Beach; heroic act caught on camera
description: Chaos erupted at Sydney's Bondi Beach as a gunman opened fire, killing at least 11 people. A dramatic video shows a brave bystander tackling the shooter and disarming him amidst the panic. Police have apprehended two individuals following the terrifying incident near a Hanukkah event.  The scene was one of widespread fear and immediate medical response.

Blake Lively calls Taylor Swift ‘the dreamiest friend’ amid Eras Tour buzz
description: Blake Lively celebrated a business venture amid reports of a strained friendship with Taylor Swift. Swift is reportedly "hurt" and feels used due to Lively's legal issues involving her "It Ends with Us" co-star. Lively's social media post focused on her haircare brand collaboration, pointedly avoiding any mention of Swift, highlighting a careful navigation of public perception and personal relationships.

title: Neurosurgeon explains why Japanese people live longer and healthier lives
description: A neurosurgeon reveals Japan's exceptional longevity stems not just from diet, but from daily habits. Consistent routines, mindful eating with smaller portions, integrated physical activity, and strong social connections significantly reduce strain on the nervous system and metabolism. This approach fosters healthier aging, emphasizing preventive care and a balanced lifestyle over quick fixes.

title: Climate migration begins: Tuvaluans relocate to Australia; special visas take effect
description: Australia has welcomed the first climate migrants from Tuvalu, a Pacific nation facing inundation due to rising sea levels. A groundbreaking bilateral treaty allows Tuvaluans to live, study, and work in Australia, receiving immediate access to essential services. This initiative offers a dignified pathway as the island nation grapples with existential threats from climate change.

title: Connor McDavid’s wife, Lauren Kyle launches Sports Club Atelier collection
description: Lauren Kyle, wife of NHL star Connor McDavid, is launching a Canada-inspired collection for her brand, Sports Club Atelier, in January. Drawing inspiration from vintage winter advertising and alpine campaigns, the line features red-and-white pieces designed for fans to express patriotic pride fashionably at sporting events and in everyday life.

title: Triple H & Stephanie McMahon net worth 2025: WWE careers & ventures
description: Triple H and Stephanie McMahon's combined net worth is estimated at $500 million in 2025, reflecting their significant contributions to WWE's corporate and creative success. Their leadership in talent development, branding, and strategic expansion has built a strong financial foundation and continues to shape WWE's future identity and growth under TKO.
